LanguageData.PW_CompPokemonEggHatcherSoon: Sounds can be heard coming from inside! This Egg will hatch soon!
LanguageData.PW_CompPokemonEggHatcherClose: It appears to move occasionally. It may be close to hatching.
LanguageData.PW_CompPokemonEggHatcherNotClose: What Pokémon will hatch from this Egg? It doesn't seem close to hatching.
LanguageData.PW_CompPokemonEggHatcherLong: It looks like this Egg will take a long time to hatch.
LanguageData.PW_StatNatureDesc: Determines this Pokémon's personality, and influence its growth.
LanguageData.PW_StatNatureNoChangeDesc: This Pokémon's stats aren't affected by his nature.
LanguageData.PW_StatEggGroupDesc: The Egg Group this Pokémon belongs to. If two Pokémon of opposite gender share the same Egg Group, they may breed together.
LanguageData.PW_StatTypeDesc: The type of this Pokémon. The type of a Pokémon typically defines which types of damaging moves is super effective against it, which types of moves is not very effective against it, and which types of moves is completely ineffective against it. If the type of a move matches one of the types of the Pokémon using it, it gains a boost in power.
LanguageData.PW_DesignationPutInPokeballDesc: Put the Pokémon back in its Poké Ball
LanguageData.PW_DesignationStoreInPCDesc: Store the Pokémon in a PC
LanguageData.PW_DesignationStoreInPCWarning: Must designate an owned Poké Ball
LanguageData.PW_IncidentBabyPokemonDesc: A baby {0}, abandonned or lost, has wandered into the area.\n\nIt seem accustomed to human contact and is joining your colony.
LanguageData.PW_SettingsWildPokemonFrequencyDesc: The percentage of Pokémon found in the wild over other creatures, such as vanilla Rimworld animals and other modded creatures.\nThis settings affects wild creatures spawn, creatures in incidents, and those sold by traders. (Can be changed anytime)
LanguageData.PW_WarningMasterNotDrafted: This Pokémon's master is not drafted
LanguageData.PW_WarningMasterTooFar: This Pokémon's master is too far
LanguageData.PW_CannotGoNoMaster: Cannot go here: Pokémon has no master
LanguageData.PW_CannotGoTooFarFromMaster: Cannot go here: too far from master
LanguageData.PW_CannotAttackNoMaster: Cannot attack: Pokémon has no master
LanguageData.PW_CannotAttackTooFarFromMaster: Cannot attack: too far from master
LanguageData.PW_StatCatchRateDesc: Chance of successfully catching this Pokémon when at full health with a normal Poké Ball belt: {0}
LanguageData.PW_TakeBackEverstoneDesc: Allows the Pokémon to evolve naturally by taking back his Everstone
LanguageData.PW_GiveEverstoneDesc: Prevent the Pokémon from evolving by giving him an Everstone
LanguageData.PW_StopEvolutionDesc: Scare the Pokémon to prevent him from evolving
LanguageData.PW_MessageEverstonePreventsEvolution: {0} tries to evolve, but his Everstone prevents him!
LanguageData.PW_ShinyPokemonLetterDesc: A rare Pokémon has entered the area! It shines with a peculiar color.\n\nYou should try to catch it before it leaves.
LanguageData.PW_MalevolentTVLetterText: While watching the megascreen television, {0} sense an oddly malevolent feeling coming from it.....\n\nAlmost as if it's staring.....
LanguageData.PW_WildRotomLetterText: It looks like there's a Pokemon in the TV!\n\nA wild Rotom has appeared!
